Approximately

/…ôÀàpr…ëÀêks…ôm…ôtli/

adverb

Used to show that something is almost, but not completely, accurate or exact.

"The building is approximately 100 meters tall."

/k…ôÀàp√¶s…ôti/

noun

/Ààs…úÀêrk…ômst√¶ns/

noun

/Ààk…ëÀêmpr…ôma…™z/
